changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('FFF_REPORTING.FME_TIMESERIES_AUDIT', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE FFF_REPORTING.FME_TIMESERIES_AUDIT ( ID BIGINT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, TS_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL INDEX IX_FME_TIMESERIES_AUDIT_TS_ID, TS_OBJECT_COUNT INT NOT NULL, FME_STATUS INT NOT NULL, TS_WORKFLOW NVARCHAR(64) NULL, TS_STAGED_TIME DATETIMEOFFSET(7) NULL, TS_PROCESSED_OBJECT_COUNT INT NULL, FME_LOAD_STARTED DATETIMEOFFSET(7) NULL, FME_LOAD_FINISHED DATETIMEOFFSET(7) NULL CONSTRAINT PK_FME_TIMESERIES_AUDIT PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([ID]) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('FFF_REPORTING.FME_TIMESERIES_AUDIT', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE FFF_REPORTING.FME_TIMESERIES_AUDIT
